00014     struct NameLess
00015     {
00016         bool mStrict;
00017 
00018         NameLess (bool strict) : mStrict (strict) {}
00019 
00020         bool operator() (const std::string& left, const std::string& right) const
00021         {
00022             if (mStrict)
00023                 return left<right;
00024 
00025             std::size_t min = std::min (left.length(), right.length());
00026 
00027             for (std::size_t i=0; i<min; ++i)
00028             {
00029                 char l = std::tolower (left[i],std::locale());
00030                 char r = std::tolower (right[i],std::locale());
00031 
00032                 if (l<r)
00033                     return true;
00034                 if (l>r)
00035                     return false;
00036             }
00037 
00038             return left.length()<right.length();
00039         }
00040     };
